page.title: 16Entertainment Survey Yeovil.
page.content: A{random survey}was carried out in the shopping centre of Yeovil.It gave the following information. Yeovil is a {fairly good entertain- {ment centre.}Over half of those asked visit Johnston Hall for social functions mainly,and then concerts.Again,over half visit the Johnson Hall,for social functions mainly,& then concerts.Again,over half visit the Swan Theatre once a year, (53%).The{cinema is popular}&{81%} visit it more than twice a year;discos & clubs are also popular & are visited more than twice a month.{Bingo is less {popular}& only 37% visit.Expense was an important factor. In general there is{not enough for {young people,}& other facilities such as an ice skating rink,10 pin bowling, a leisure centre,a sports centre & band concerts,would be welcomed.
